property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionURL
property.description: Enter your Hive Metastore Connection URL, for example if MySQL: jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/mysql?createDatabaseIfNotExist=true

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionUserName
property.description: Enter your Hive Metastore database user name.

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionPassword
property.description: Enter your Hive Metastore database password.

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionDriverName
property.description: Enter your Hive Metastore Connection Driver Name, for example if MySQL: com.mysql.jdbc.Driver

property.name: hive.support.concurrency
property.description: Enable Hive's Table Lock Manager Service

property.name: hive.zookeeper.quorum
property.description: Zookeeper quorum used by Hive's Table Lock Manager

property.name: hive.zookeeper.client.port
property.description: The port at which the clients will connect.

property.name: hive.server2.thrift.port
property.description: TCP port number to listen on, default 10000

property.name: datanucleus.autoCreateSchema
property.description: Creates necessary schema on a startup if one does not exist. Set this to false, after creating it once.

property.name: datanucleus.fixedDatastore
property.description: Dictates whether to allow updates to schema or not.
